Title: Nuke it Out
Plot: As Marcus and Sam hunt for the traitor in their ranks who stole their nuclear launch key, Prosser disobeys orders and starts a small war he can?t control. Meanwhile Grace and James must work together to defuse a dangerous situation, as back in D.C. Christine is indicted as Sam's co-conspirator.
ParentalRatingReason: M Violence,drug use and sex scenes
GuestStars: Jay Karnes, Gideon Emery, Jessica Camacho, Will Rothhaar, David Rees Snell, Adrian LaTourelle, Martha Hackett, Jay Hernandez
